Package nl.inl.blacklab.search.results

Classes for dealing with results, either per-hit or per-document or grouped

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CapturedGroups
    Captured group information for a list of hits.
    Hit
    Interface for a hit.
    Result<T>
    Base class for single result classes, e.g.
    ResultGroups<T>
    Grouped results of some type
    SearchResult  
    WindowStatsInterface
    Information about a results window.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CapturedGroupsImpl
    Captured group information for a list of hits.
    Concordances
    Concordances for a list of hits.
    Contexts  
    ContextSize
    Represents the size of the context around a hit.
    CorpusSize  
    DocGroup
    A group of DocResult objects, plus the "group identity".
    DocGroups
    Applies grouping to the results in a DocResults object.
    DocResult
    A document result, containing a Lucene document from the index and a collection of Hit objects.
    DocResults
    A list of DocResult objects (document-level query results).
    Facets  
    Group<T>
    A group of results, with its group identity and the results themselves.
    HitGroup
    A group of results, with its group identity and the results themselves, that you can access randomly (i.e.
    HitGroups
    Groups results on the basis of a list of criteria.
    HitImpl
    Class for a hit.
    Hits  
    HitsFiltered
    A Hits object that filters another.
    HitsFromQuery
    A Hits object that is filled from a BLSpanQuery.
    HitsFromQueryParallel
    A Hits object that is filled from a BLSpanQuery.
    HitsList
    A basic Hits object implemented with a list.
    Kwics
    KWICs for a list of hits.
    MaxStats
    Information about whether we reached the limit of processing/counting
    QueryInfo
    Information about the original query.
    ResultCount  
    Results<T>
    A list of results of some type.
    ResultsStats  
    ResultsStatsStatic
    Static implementation of ResultsStats, suitable for when a search has ended and we want to ensure we don't keep a reference to the search.
    SampleParameters
    Parameters that determine how much to sample and whether to use a fixed seed.
    SearchSettings
    Settings for our initial search, including how many hits we want to process/count at most.
    SpansReader
    A Hits object that is filled from a BLSpanQuery.
    WindowStats
    Information about a results window.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ResultCount.CountType  

Package nl.inl.blacklab.search.results Description
